sqlMap.select:
SELECT /*TMMB0110.SEARCH00.사용자 로그인 현황*/ A.USER_IDXX , A.EMPL_NUMB , A.LGIN_IPAR , TO_CHAR(A.LGIN_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS LGIN_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.LGOT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS LGOT_DATE , B.DEPT_CODE , B.USER_NAME , SF_GET_DEPTNAME(B.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME FROM TM_LOGINX A LEFT JOIN TM_USERXM B ON A.USER_IDXX = B.USER_IDXX WHERE A.LGIN_DATE >= TO_DATE(#OPER_STDT#,'YYYYMMDD') AND A.LGIN_DATE < TO_DATE(#OPER_ENDT#,'YYYYMMDD') + 1
A.EMPL_NUMB = #EMPL_NUMB#
ORDER BY A.LGOT_DATE DESC, A.LGIN_DATE DESC
